level.heading: PRE-OPENING MODIFICATION OR WITHDRAWAL OF BIDS (ยง 27-1523)

level.text: 1523.1 Bids may be modified or withdrawn by written notice received at thelocation designated in the IFB prior to the time and date set for bid opening.An electronic modification or withdrawal received from the bidder prior to theime and date set for bid opening will be effective; provided that, there isbjective evidence in electronic form confirming that the modification orithdrawal was received prior to the time and date set for bid opening.
1523.2 If a bid is withdrawn in accordance with this subsection, the bidecurity, if any, shall be returned to the bidder.

level.heading: SOURCE
level.text: Final Rulemaking published at 35 DCR 1428 (February 26, 1988); asmended by Notice of Emergency and Proposed Rulemaking published at 59 DCR 3714March 6, 2012)[EXPIRED]; as amended by Notice of Final Rulemaking published at9 DCR 6290, 6297 (June 1, 2012).
